alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 1:18PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Nye and southern Eureka Counties through 145 PM PDT... At 117 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 28 miles southwest of Pinto Summit, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Locally moderate to heavy rainfall, which could lead to flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Nye and southern Eureka Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
